labels.label: The "processing.cycle" is set here, then split to ensure the fs storage lands the same data in the same directories as the streaming partition.

The "acid.processing.cycle.string" variable controls the 'partition' we drive to in Hive.
The Streaming Processor does "NOT REQUIRE" the partition field in the dataset if it is statically set in the flow attributes and referenced in the 'partition' element of the processor.
Use 'SQL' against RecordPath structure to transform stream.
